describer
  • Reference
  • News

Describe atomic vectors or data.frames.

describe takes vectors and data.frames and returns a data.frame containing important descriptive statistics.

describe(.x)

# S3 method for numeric
describe(.x)

# S3 method for character
describe(.x)

# S3 method for data.frame
describe(.x)

# S3 method for default
describe(.x)

Arguments

.x

a vector or data.frame to be described.

Value

a data.frame containing important descriptive statistics.

Methods (by class)

  • numeric: Method for numeric.

  • character: Method for character.

  • data.frame: Method for data.frames.

  • default: Method for default.

Examples

# Example
describe(mtcars)
#>    .column_name .count_elements .mean_value   .sd_value .q0_value .q25_value
#> 1           mpg              32   20.090625   6.0269481    10.400   15.42500
#> 2           cyl              32    6.187500   1.7859216     4.000    4.00000
#> 3          disp              32  230.721875 123.9386938    71.100  120.82500
#> 4            hp              32  146.687500  68.5628685    52.000   96.50000
#> 5          drat              32    3.596563   0.5346787     2.760    3.08000
#> 6            wt              32    3.217250   0.9784574     1.513    2.58125
#> 7          qsec              32   17.848750   1.7869432    14.500   16.89250
#> 8            vs              32    0.437500   0.5040161     0.000    0.00000
#> 9            am              32    0.406250   0.4989909     0.000    0.00000
#> 10         gear              32    3.687500   0.7378041     3.000    3.00000
#> 11         carb              32    2.812500   1.6152000     1.000    2.00000
#>    .q50_value .q75_value .q100_value
#> 1      19.200      22.80      33.900
#> 2       6.000       8.00       8.000
#> 3     196.300     326.00     472.000
#> 4     123.000     180.00     335.000
#> 5       3.695       3.92       4.930
#> 6       3.325       3.61       5.424
#> 7      17.710      18.90      22.900
#> 8       0.000       1.00       1.000
#> 9       0.000       1.00       1.000
#> 10      4.000       4.00       5.000
#> 11      2.000       4.00       8.000
describe(iris)
#>   .column_name .count_elements .mean_value .sd_value .q0_value .q25_value
#> 1 Sepal.Length             150    5.843333 0.8280661       4.3        5.1
#> 2  Sepal.Width             150    3.057333 0.4358663         2        2.8
#> 3 Petal.Length             150    3.758000 1.7652982         1        1.6
#> 4  Petal.Width             150    1.199333 0.7622377       0.1        0.3
#> 5      Species             150          NA        NA    setosa         NA
#>   .q50_value .q75_value .q100_value
#> 1       5.80        6.4         7.9
#> 2       3.00        3.3         4.4
#> 3       4.35        5.1         6.9
#> 4       1.30        1.8         2.5
#> 5         NA         NA   virginica
describe(state.name)
#>   .count_elements .mean_value .sd_value .q0_value .q25_value .q50_value
#> 1              50          NA        NA   Alabama         NA         NA
#>   .q75_value .q100_value
#> 1         NA     Wyoming
